description:
If you live in Atlanta, Georgia, and you need legal assistance following an injury caused by someone else's negligence, The Balams Firm can help you obtain the compensation you need to support yourself and your family. Serving residents in the Atlanta metro area and throughout the state of Georgia, the law firm provides high-quality, effective representation for all types of personal injury and medical malpractice claims, including each of the following:

  • Premises liability
  • Injuries to children
  • Dog bites
  • Auto accidents
  • Medical malpractice
  • Nursing home abuse and neglect
  • Wrongful death

ReShea J. Balams has helped hundreds of individuals and their families achieve the justice they seek following a preventable injury or loss. Understanding the sensitive and emotional aspects involved with personal injury cases, Ms. Balams will treat you with the dignity and respect you deserve, and she will remain with you throughout the entire legal process to ensure she achieves your needs and goals.

If you were injured or lost a loved one as a result of someone else's careless or negligent actions, you can count on The Balams Firm to advocate on your behalf, secure the compensation you need and hold the responsible parties accountable. By contacting the law firm to schedule a free initial consultation, you can begin on your path to full recovery.
